thread.title: Nevada's legal brothels are the state's not-so-secret vice
thread.title_full: Nevada's legal brothels are the state's not-so-secret vice

title: Nevada's legal brothels are the state's not-so-secret vice
text: > Entertainment Nevada's legal brothels are the state's not-so-secret vice FILE - In this July 31, 2009, file photo, Los Angeles Lakers' Lamar Odom speaks to the media during a news conference after the Lakers signed Odom to a multi-year NBA basketball contract, in El Segundo, Calif. Odom spent most of his 14-year NBA career in Los Angeles with the Lakers and Clippers, becoming a fan favorite before he sought even more fame with the Kardashians. Odom, who was embraced by teammates and television fans alike for his Everyman approach to fame, was found face-down and alone Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015, after spending four days at the Love Ranch, a legal Nevada brothel. (AP Photo/Jeff Lewis, File)
